boardgame.name: Francis Drake
boardgame.description: Game description from the publisher:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Return to a bustling Plymouth Harbor in 1572 as an aspiring Elizabethan captain making preparations for three exciting voyages to the Spanish Main in search of fame and fortune! As captains, players will have to plan their missions and provision their ships accordingly._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Francis Drake is a race to see who can set sail and reach the Spanish Main first. The riches of the Aztec and Inca Empires await these swashbuckling captains. Many tough decisions must be made before each voyage:_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; How many crew members, guns, and trade goods will be needed?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; What supplies will be needed to reach deep into the Caribbean?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Will a stronger galleon be needed to attack the treasure fleets?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Can special charts from the Spanish Admiral and Governor help?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Will the Queen or rich investors back the voyage?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; What information can the informer give?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Will Drake himself be available to guide the voyage?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Who will get the use of the Golden Hind?_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each new voyage has its own challenges to overcome, but the captured gold, silver, and jewels should greatly please the Queen. Get ready for the voyage of a lifetime!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 2013 Golden Geek Best Board Game Artwork/Presentation Nominee
2014 Origins Awards Best Historical Board Game Nominee
2015 Best Australian Awards Best Australian Game Nominee
boardgame.boardgamepodcastepisode: DdJ 033. Revista Token. Arte gráfico en los juegos de mesa. Mini reseñas.
Episode 1 -- Francis Drake and the Opening Day Jitters
Episode 29 - Looks Like We Made It
The Game Pit Episode 16 - Picking Over the Bones
The Game Pit: Episode 14.2 - Essen Spiel 2013 Special
The Game Pit: Episode 17 - The Bumper End of Year Review
The Game Pit: Episode 27 - Top Ten from 2013
Vox Republica 091: Arkham’s Finest - An Interview with Richard Launius

Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: CLS Games - Atlanta_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Board Game Warehouse - is the largest retailer of board games in metro Atlanta! All games are new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; still in factory shrink-wrap. *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** FRANCIS DRAKE: $49.95 Eagle Games [FRD 411] Publisher_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Anticipated Release Date: Q4 2013 *** *** PRE-ORDER *** *** SHIPPING Continental U.S. - $14.95 International (Including AK _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; HI) - TBD

Everything in excellent condition. The green Frigate is a different ship than all the Frigates for the other colors. This is how the game was from the beginning. It is a similar type of ship, but not the same. It does not affect how the game plays. The Spain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Revenge expansion is not included (it is sold separately). Shipping _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; Handling: Please, send me an e-mail with your postal code and I will let you know about the cost. Payment: PayPal ONLY.
Played only once. Come with two unopened kickstater expansion. Will ship to United States only by USPS Priority Mail Flat Rate Box.
English/German first edition Publisher: Eagle Games,?Kayal Games

For some reason, the green frigate is a different mold than the other coloured frigates, and the rule book has a small amount of handwriting in two spots. Take advantage of my shelf-space woes! When you buy more than one game, pay full price for your highest priced item, but get 20% off of each additional item. US buyers - please note: shipping to the US is very expensive. To ship a Days of Wonder shaped box runs approximately $25, if not more.
opened and punched but pristine unplayed. Shipping will be best value from 80218 to your USA address for approx 7 lbs

new _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; sealed. $15 s/h anywhere in the USA. I accept any of the following three methods of payment: (1) PayPal *** (no cash discount; +5%) (2) Money Order (From U.S. or Canadian Post Offices Only) (3) Cash (U.S. Dollars only)

I will send this game to the eventual buyer using the Hermes courier service. It will be delivered to your door and needs to signed for upon receipt. To most UK destinations the cost will be £6.50. There are some more remote areas that will cost more. If that is the case you are already aware of this. European destinations will cost a lot more. Please enquire first before making purchase.
Board game is in new condition as received from the distributor.

New in shrink. You will pay exact shipping costs based on your preference -- priority/insurance/etc. I will request $15 as shipping cost estimate and refund the difference. Happy to combine shipping. Also willing to sell other games from my owned/trade list, please make a reasonable offer. Shipping to USA/Canada only.

Item is intended only for user william4192, the winner of the You need new games, I need...to start student loan repayment auction

Eagle Games (EGL101411N) Return to a bustling Plymouth Harbor in 1572 as an aspiring Elizabethan captain making preparations for three exciting voyages to the Spanish Main in search of fame and fortune! As such captains, players will have to plan their missions and provision their ships accordingly. This is a race to see who can set sail and reach the Spanish Main first. The riches of the Aztec and Inca Empires await these swashbuckling captains. Each new voyage has its own challenges to overcome but the captured gold, silver and jewels should greatly please the Queen. Get ready for The Voyage of a Lifetime!
includes Expansions Montezuma_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Legacy and Spain_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s Revenge. Only played once. Expansions still in shrink wrap Please note can only ship to mainland UK only.
Versand in Deutschland 5,90€

This package will include accessories for the 2-player variant: a Glenmore-style die (3, 2, 2, 1,1,1) that moves the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;Sir John_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; dummy player; and 13 black discs (same size as the player pieces) to cover up various blocked locations. Shipping included.

Eagle Games (EGL101411N) Return to a bustling Plymouth Harbor in 1572 as an aspiring Elizabethan captain making preparations for three exciting voyages to the Spanish Main in search of fame and fortune! As such captains, players will have to plan their missions and provision their ships accordingly. This is a race to see who can set sail and reach the Spanish Main first. The riches of the Aztec and Inca Empires await these swashbuckling captains. Each new voyage has its own challenges to overcome but the captured gold, silver and jewels should greatly please the Queen. Get ready for The Voyage of a Lifetime!

Eagle Games (EGL101411N) Return to a bustling Plymouth Harbor in 1572 as an aspiring Elizabethan captain making preparations for three exciting voyages to the Spanish Main in search of fame and fortune! Each new voyage has its own challenges to overcome but the captured gold, silver and jewels should greatly please the Queen. Get ready for The Voyage of a Lifetime!
